    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中HFileScanner的使用

      返回HFileScanner的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HFileScanner StoreFileReader.getScanner(boolean cacheBlocks, boolean pread)
      已过时。 
      Do not write further code which depends on this call. Instead use getStoreFileScanner() which uses the StoreFileScanner class/interface which is the preferred way to scan a store with higher level concepts.
      HFileScanner StoreFileReader.getScanner(boolean cacheBlocks, boolean pread, boolean isCompaction)
      已过时。 
      Do not write further code which depends on this call. Instead use getStoreFileScanner() which uses the StoreFileScanner class/interface which is the preferred way to scan a store with higher level concepts.
      参数类型为HFileScanner的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean StoreFileScanner.seekAtOrAfter(HFileScanner s, Cell k) 
      参数类型为HFileScanner的org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      StoreFileScanner(StoreFileReader reader, HFileScanner hfs, boolean useMVCC, boolean hasMVCC, long readPt, long scannerOrder, boolean canOptimizeForNonNullColumn)
      Implements a KeyValueScanner on top of the specified HFileScanner
